item.title: [CAMEL-12561] camel-kubernetes: serviceCall EIP throws NullPointerException
item.description:
I've written the following route:

 

rest().get("/purchases")
  .route()
  .serviceCall().name("inventory/api/purchases")
    .kubernetesServiceDiscovery();
